com.medusabookdepot.model.modelInterface

Interface Customer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Transferrer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerImpl, LibraryImpl, PersonImpl, PrinterImpl

    public interface Customer
extends Transferrer
    This interface represents a Transferrer that is not a Depot, so does simple operations
    Author:
    Marcello_Feroce
